name: The Newborn (ocathekid)
description:
Sir Nicolas, a knight of the last Empire and witch hunter was cursed by one and as a result of that, all his next children will be born monsters. After many years his wife got pregnant and when the child was born, this indeed was the most horrendous monster ever seen. Even with all the pain that it caused him, he had to kill him to save humanity. 

Why is the player there? Every year he would  visit his grave to pay his respects but one day when he got to the dungeon where his grave was, the body was missing.

What is the player's goal? The goal is to find out what happened with the child's body and see if somehow he came back to life.

Where is the start and the end of the level? The start of the level is outside the dungeon and to go in the is a secret hallway that is behind a wall with torches. The only way of opening the door is by pushing one torch down. As someone had already been there, the door is open.

What obstacles will the player have to overcome? Sir Nicolas has to find clues to find what happened to his child.

*IMPORTANT*

To open the level, first, run the file, then on 'Content Browser' open the folder that says "MedievalDungeon". Inside of that folder, there will be another one that says "Maps" and when you open it, double-click on "Demostration"
